212: It is now 11 years since I have written any thing in this book. - I take it again Feb y 17. 1821 . - I have gained much since that period & I have lost something yet I am thankful to infinite wisdom for blessings & benefits & I bow with reverence xxxxxx his chastisements which xxx always in mercy. May every year make me better , more useful, less selfish & more devoted to the cause of humanity & science.
